alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Greeley; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 2:23PM CST until November 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Light snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 1 inch, mainly south of Highway 40 over portions of Wichita, Logan and Gove counties. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with snow covered roadways. This includes portions of the Interstate 70 corridor in northwest Kansas, mainly east of Oakley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional light snow accumulation is expected before precipitation ends from west to east this afternoon. With overcast skies and temperatures hovering in the upper teens to lower 20s, little if any melting will occur today. Winds will remain at or below 10 mph through sunset this evening. Wind chill readings as low as 5 degrees below zero are expected late this evening and early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and exercise additional caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gove; Graham; Greeley; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
